metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0995 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An out-of-bounds (OOB) memory write flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™swatch_queue event notification subsystem. This flaw can overwrite parts ofthe kernel state, potentially allowing a local user to gain privilegedaccess or cause a denial of service on the system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
